sdgs.title: No Poverty
sdgs.description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere.

sdgs.title: Zero Hunger
sdgs.description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture.

sdgs.title: Good Health and Well-being
sdgs.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages.

sdgs.title: Quality Education
sdgs.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.

sdgs.title: Gender Equality
sdgs.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls.

sdgs.title: Clean Water and Sanitation
sdgs.description: Ensure access to water and sanitation for all.

sdgs.title: Affordable and Clean Energy
sdgs.description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all.

sdgs.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
sdgs.description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment.

sdgs.title: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
sdgs.description: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization.

sdgs.title: Reduced Inequalities
sdgs.description: Reduce inequality within and among countries.

sdgs.title: Sustainable Cities and Communities
sdgs.description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable.

sdgs.title: Responsible Consumption and Production
sdgs.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns.

sdgs.title: Climate Action
sdgs.description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.

sdgs.title: Life Below Water
sdgs.description: Conserve and sustainably use oceans, seas and marine resources.

sdgs.title: Life on Land
sdgs.description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems.

sdgs.title: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
sdgs.description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development.

sdgs.title: Partnerships for the Goals
sdgs.description: Strengthen the means of implementation and global partnership for sustainable development.
